hints.content:
We can think of division as the following:

$\greenD{\text{ Total}}\div\blueD{\text{ Number of Groups}}$

or 

$\greenD{\text{ Total}}\div\maroonD{\text{ Size of the Groups}}$

We have a $\greenD{\text{total}}$ of $\greenD{12}$ flowers.

The $\maroonD{\text{size of the groups}}$ of flowers is $\maroonD3$.  

Which image shows $\greenD{12}$ flowers divided evenly into groups of $\maroonD3$?

This image represents the situation:

[[☃ image 1]]

options.alt: Four groups of 3 flowers. Each group of flowers has a circle around it. !

question.content:
Avery plants $12$ flowers in her garden.  She plants $3$ flowers in each flower pot.  

**Which image could represent this situation?**


[[☃ radio 1]]
